00065 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00066 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00067 {
00068   if ( !Fs::dirExists("test-generated") ) {
00069     Fs::mkdir("test-generated");
00070   }
00071 
00072   RT_Main* rMain;
00073   rMain = new RT_Main("apt-rt-copynumber-cyto");
00074 
00075   //Store names of tests for Help Message
00076   //Store it in our RT_Main Instance
00077   std::vector<std::string> testNameList;
00078   testNameList.push_back("single");
00079   testNameList.push_back("batch");
00080   testNameList.push_back("qt_single");
00081   testNameList.push_back("qt_batch");
00082   rMain->setTestNameList(testNameList);
00083 
00084   //Set Variables
00085   rMain->setVar("sdktop", "../../..");
00086   rMain->setVar("gold_idata_copynumbercyto_testname", "${gold_dir}/idata/copynumber-cyto/${testname}");
00087   rMain->setVar("gold_idata_copynumbercyto_cytogeneticsarray_testname", "${gold_dir}/idata/copynumber-cyto/Cytogenetics_Array/${testname}");
00088   rMain->setVar("gold_idata_copynumbercyto_batch", "${gold_dir}/idata/copynumber-cyto/batch");
00089   rMain->setVar("gold_idata_copynumbercyto_cytogeneticsarray", "${gold_dir}/idata/copynumber-cyto/Cytogenetics_Array");
00090   rMain->setVar("gold_idata_lib_cytogeneticsarray", "${gold_dir}/idata/lib/Cytogenetics_Array");
00091   rMain->setVar("gold_idata_cel_cytogeneticsarray", "${gold_dir}/idata/cel/Cytogenetics_Array");
00092   rMain->setVar("out_cytogeneticsarray", "${out_dir}/Cytogenetics_Array");
00093   rMain->setVar("out_testname", "${out_dir}/${testname}");
00094   rMain->setVar("out_batch", "${out_dir}/batch");
00095   rMain->setVar("out_cytogeneticsarray_testname", "${out_dir}/Cytogenetics_Array/${testname}");
00096 
00097   rMain->setVar("gold_testname", "${gold_dir}/${testname}");
00098   rMain->setVar("gold_lib_cytogeneticsarray", "${gold_dir}/lib/Cytogenetics_Array");
00099   rMain->setVar("gold_cel_cytogeneticsarray", "${gold_dir}/cel/Cytogenetics_Array");
00100   rMain->setVar("gold_copynumbercyto", "${gold_dir}/copynumber-cyto");
00101   rMain->setVar("gold_copynumbercyto_testname", "${gold_copynumbercyto}/${testname}");
00102   rMain->setVar("gold_copynumbercyto_cytogeneticsarray_testname", "${gold_copynumbercyto}/Cytogenetics_Array/${testname}");
00103   rMain->setVar("gold_copynumbercyto_cytogeneticsarray", "${gold_copynumbercyto}/Cytogenetics_Array");
00104   rMain->setVar("gold_copynumbercyto_batch", "${gold_copynumbercyto}/batch");
00105   rMain->parseArgv(argc, argv);
00106   if(argc < 1)
00107     {
00108       cout<<"Error: Incorrect number of arguments given"<<endl;
00109       exit(1);
00110     }
00111   else if(rMain->getVarVal("allIntegration") != "")
00112     {
00113       rMain->addTest(qt_single());
00114       rMain->addTest(qt_batch());
00115     }
00116   else if(rMain->getVarVal("allNormal") != "")
00117     {
00118       rMain->addTest(single());
00119       rMain->addTest(batch());
00120     }
00121   //They want us to run all default tests
00122   else if(argc == 1 || rMain->getVarVal("all") != "")
00123     {
00124       //RUN ALL TESTS OMG
00125       cout<<"Running all default Regression Tests!"<<endl;
00126       rMain->addTest(qt_single());
00127       rMain->addTest(qt_batch());
00128       rMain->addTest(single());
00129       rMain->addTest(batch());
00130     }
00131   else
00132     {
00133       cout<<"Running Built-In Regression Tests"<<endl;
00134 
00135       if(rMain->getVarVal("qt_single") != "")
00136     {
00137       rMain->addTest(qt_single());
00138     }
00139       if(rMain->getVarVal("qt_batch") != "")
00140     {
00141       rMain->addTest(qt_batch());
00142     }
00143       if(rMain->getVarVal("single") != "")
00144     {
00145       rMain->addTest(single());
00146     }
00147       if(rMain->getVarVal("batch") != "")
00148     {
00149       rMain->addTest(batch());
00150     }
00151     }
00152 
00153   rMain->runTests();
00154 }

00156 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00157 RT_Test* qt_single()
00158 {
00159   RT_Test* rt;
00160   rt = new RT_Test("single");
00161 
00162   RT_Cmd* cmd = rt->newCmd();
00163   cmd->setExe("${apt_copynumber_cyto}");
00164   cmd->addArg("-v", "3");
00165   cmd->addArg("--cyto2", "true");
00166   cmd->addArg("--force", "true");
00167   cmd->addArg("--text-output", "true");
00168   cmd->addArg("--cnchp-output", "false");
00169   cmd->addArg("--cychp-output", "true");
00170   cmd->addArg("--set-analysis-name", "ca");
00171   cmd->addArg("--reference-input", "${gold_idata_lib_cytogeneticsarray}/Cytogenetics_Array.na28.REF_MODEL");
00172   cmd->addArg("--snp-reference-input-file", "${gold_idata_lib_cytogeneticsarray}/Cytogenetics_Array.na28.snpref.a5");
00173   cmd->addArg("--spf-file", "${gold_idata_lib_cytogeneticsarray}/Cytogenetics_Array.spf");
00174   cmd->addArg("--chrX-probes", "${gold_idata_lib_cytogeneticsarray}/Cytogenetics_Array.chrXprobes");
00175   cmd->addArg("--chrY-probes", "${gold_idata_lib_cytogeneticsarray}/Cytogenetics_Array.chrYprobes");
00176   cmd->addArg("--annotation-file", "${gold_idata_lib_cytogeneticsarray}/Cytogenetics_Array.na28.annot.db");
00177   cmd->addArg("--probe-file", "${gold_idata_lib_cytogeneticsarray}/Cytogenetics_Array.probe_tab");
00178   cmd->addArg("--snp-qc-snp-list", "${gold_idata_lib_cytogeneticsarray}/Cytogenetics_Array.snplist.txt");
00179   cmd->addArg("--cels", "${gold_idata_cel_cytogeneticsarray}/HapMap-As_NA18547_A08_01_NN_20081218.CEL");
00180   cmd->addArg("--cels", "${gold_idata_cel_cytogeneticsarray}/HapMap-As_NA18603_B03_01_NN_20081218.CEL");
00181   cmd->addArg("--cels", "${gold_idata_cel_cytogeneticsarray}/HapMap-As_NA18971_C02_01_NN_20081218.CEL");
00182   cmd->addArg("--cels", "${gold_idata_cel_cytogeneticsarray}/HapMap-Cs_NA10857_A10_01_NN_20081218.CEL");
00183   cmd->addArg("--cels", "${gold_idata_cel_cytogeneticsarray}/HapMap-Cs_NA12003_D04_01_NN_20081218.CEL");
00184   cmd->addArg("--out-dir", "${out_testname}");
00185   cmd->addArg("--male-gender-ratio-cutoff=1.3");
00186   cmd->addArg("--female-gender-ratio-cutoff=1.0");
00187   cmd->addArg("--xx-cutoff=0.8");
00188   cmd->addArg("--xx-cutoff-high=1.07");
00189   cmd->addArg("--y-cutoff=0.65");
00190   cmd->addArg("--analysis", "log2-ratio-cyto2.gc-correction=true.median-autosome-median-normalization=true.median-smooth-marker-count=5.trim-high=2.0.trim-low=-2.5");
00191   cmd->addArg("--analysis", "kernel-smooth.sigma_span=50");
00192   cmd->addArg("--analysis", "cn-cyto2.diagonal-weight=0.995.mapd-weight=0.22.min-segment-size=5.hmm-confidence-weight=0.6");
00193   cmd->addArg("--analysis", "cn-cyto2-gender.cutoff=0.5");
00194   cmd->addArg("--analysis", "cn-segment");
00195   cmd->addArg("--analysis", "loh-cyto2.lohCNSegSeparation=1000000.minInformation=100.lambdaCritical=8.0");
00196   cmd->addArg("--analysis", "mosaicism.marker-bandwidth=6000.confidence-window=251");
00197   cmd->addArg("--analysis", "allele-peaks.step=100.window=250.point-count=128.bandwidth=0.45.cutoff=0.05");
00198   cmd->addArg("--local-gc-background-correction-reference-method", "pdnn-reference-method");
00199   cmd->addArg("--wave-correction-reference-method", "wave-correction-reference-method.trim=2.0.percentile=0.75.demean=false");
00200   cmd->addArg("--local-gc-background-intensity-adjustment-method", "pdnn-intensity-adjustment-method.predicted-intensity-bin-count=20.gc-bin-count=20.residual-trim=2.0");
00201   cmd->addArg("--image-correction-intensity-adjustment-method", "high-pass-filter-intensity-adjustment-method.data-block-rows=320.data-block-cols=2015.mini-block-rows=8.mini-block-cols=8.global-smooth-weight=256.local-smooth-weight=64.converged=0.0001");
00202   cmd->addArg("--wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method", "wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method.bandwidth=101.bin-count=25.wave-count=3");
00203   cmd->addArg("--reference-chromosome=22");
00204 
00205   std::vector<std::string> gen, gold;
00206   gen = Util::addPrefixSuffix(qt_cytogenetics_array_sixfiles, "${out_testname}/", ".ca.cychp");
00207   gold = Util::addPrefixSuffix(qt_cytogenetics_array_sixfiles, "${gold_idata_copynumbercyto_testname}/", ".ca.cychp");
00208 
00209 RT_Check* check = rt->newCheck();
00210   check->setExe("${apt_calvin_equivalent}");
00211   check->setGenFiles(gen);
00212   check->setGoldFiles(gold);
00213   check->setGenGoldFileIsArg(true);
00214   check->addArg("--ignore-params-file", "./ignoreParamFile.tsv");
00215   check->addArg("--epsilon-map-file", "./qt_mapEpsilonFile.tsv");
00216   check->addArg("--epsilon", "0.0001");
00217   check->addArg("--correlation", "0.9999989");
00218   check->addArg("--check-header", "false");
00219 
00220   return rt;
00221 }

00224 RT_Test* single()

00227   rt = new RT_Test("single");
00228 
00229   RT_Cmd* cmd = rt->newCmd();
00230   cmd->setExe("${apt_copynumber_cyto}");
00231   cmd->addArg("-v", "3");
00232   cmd->addArg("--cyto2", "true");
00233   cmd->addArg("--force", "true");
00234   cmd->addArg("--text-output", "true");

00254   cmd->addArg("--female-gender-ratio-cutoff=1.0");
00255   cmd->addArg("--xx-cutoff=0.8");

00259   cmd->addArg("--analysis", "kernel-smooth.sigma_span=50");
00260   cmd->addArg("--analysis", "cn-cyto2.diagonal-weight=0.995.mapd-weight=0.22.min-segment-size=5.hmm-confidence-weight=0.6");

00269   cmd->addArg("--image-correction-intensity-adjustment-method", "high-pass-filter-intensity-adjustment-method.data-block-rows=320.data-block-cols=2015.mini-block-rows=8.mini-block-cols=8.global-smooth-weight=256.local-smooth-weight=64.converged=0.0001");

00275

00280   check->setGenGoldFileIsArg(true);
00281   check->addArg("--ignore-params-file", "./ignoreParamFile.tsv");

00283   check->addArg("--correlation", "0.9999989");
00284   check->addArg("--check-header", "false");
00285 
00286   return rt;
00287 }

00290 RT_Test* qt_batch()
00291 {
00292   RT_Test* rt;
00293   rt = new RT_Test("batch");
00294   RT_Test* rt1;
00295   rt1 = new RT_Test("batch-part1");
00296   RT_Test* rt2;
00297   rt2 = new RT_Test("batch-part2");
00298 
00299 
00300   RT_Cmd* cmd1 = rt1->newCmd();
00301   cmd1->setExe("${apt_copynumber_cyto}");
00302   cmd1->addArg("-v", "3");
00303   cmd1->addArg("--cyto2", "true");
00304   cmd1->addArg("--force", "true");
00305   cmd1->addArg("--text-output", "true");
00306   cmd1->addArg("--cnchp-output", "false");
00307   cmd1->addArg("--cychp-output", "true");
00308   cmd1->addArg("--set-analysis-name", "ca");
00309   cmd1->addArg("--reference-output", "${out_batch}/Cytogenetics_Array.10_cels.REF_MODEL");
00310   cmd1->addArg("--snp-reference-input-file", "${gold_idata_lib_cytogeneticsarray}/Cytogenetics_Array.na28.snpref.a5");
00311   cmd1->addArg("--snp-reference-output-file", "${out_batch}/Cytogenetics_Array.10_cels.snpref.a5");
00312   cmd1->addArg("--spf-file", "${gold_idata_lib_cytogeneticsarray}/Cytogenetics_Array.spf");
00313   cmd1->addArg("--chrX-probes", "${gold_idata_lib_cytogeneticsarray}/Cytogenetics_Array.chrXprobes");
00314   cmd1->addArg("--chrY-probes", "${gold_idata_lib_cytogeneticsarray}/Cytogenetics_Array.chrYprobes");
00315   cmd1->addArg("--annotation-file", "${gold_idata_lib_cytogeneticsarray}/Cytogenetics_Array.na28.annot.db");
00316   cmd1->addArg("--probe-file", "${gold_idata_lib_cytogeneticsarray}/Cytogenetics_Array.probe_tab");
00317   cmd1->addArg("--snp-qc-snp-list", "${gold_idata_lib_cytogeneticsarray}/Cytogenetics_Array.snplist.txt");
00318   cmd1->addArg("--gender-override-file", "${gold_idata_lib_cytogeneticsarray}/HapMap-LOHReference-Full-Genders.txt");
00319   cmd1->addArg("--genotype-call-override-file", "${gold_idata_lib_cytogeneticsarray}/HapMapCalls_LOHReferenceSet-FullArray.txt");
00320   cmd1->addArg("--cel-files", "${gold_idata_cel_cytogeneticsarray}/CELFileList_5F5M.txt");
00321   cmd1->addArg("--out-dir", "${out_batch}");
00322   cmd1->addArg("--male-gender-ratio-cutoff=1.3");
00323   cmd1->addArg("--female-gender-ratio-cutoff=1.0");
00324   cmd1->addArg("--xx-cutoff=0.8");
00325   cmd1->addArg("--xx-cutoff-high=1.07");
00326   cmd1->addArg("--y-cutoff=0.65");
00327   cmd1->addArg("--analysis", "log2-ratio-cyto2.gc-correction=true.median-autosome-median-normalization=true.median-smooth-marker-count=5.trim-high=2.0.trim-low=-2.5");
00328   cmd1->addArg("--analysis", "kernel-smooth.sigma_span=50");
00329   cmd1->addArg("--analysis", "cn-cyto2.diagonal-weight=0.995.mapd-weight=0.22.min-segment-size=5.hmm-confidence-weight=0.6");
00330   cmd1->addArg("--analysis", "cn-cyto2-gender.cutoff=0.5");
00331   cmd1->addArg("--analysis", "cn-segment");
00332   cmd1->addArg("--analysis", "loh-cyto2.lohCNSegSeparation=1000000.minInformation=100.lambdaCritical=8.0");
00333   cmd1->addArg("--analysis", "mosaicism.marker-bandwidth=6000.confidence-window=251");
00334   cmd1->addArg("--analysis", "allele-peaks.step=100.window=250.point-count=128.bandwidth=0.45.cutoff=0.05");
00335   cmd1->addArg("--local-gc-background-correction-reference-method", "pdnn-reference-method");
00336   cmd1->addArg("--wave-correction-reference-method", "wave-correction-reference-method.trim=2.0.percentile=0.75.demean=false");
00337   cmd1->addArg("--local-gc-background-intensity-adjustment-method", "pdnn-intensity-adjustment-method.predicted-intensity-bin-count=20.gc-bin-count=20.residual-trim=2.0");
00338   cmd1->addArg("--image-correction-intensity-adjustment-method", "high-pass-filter-intensity-adjustment-method.data-block-rows=320.data-block-cols=2015.mini-block-rows=8.mini-block-cols=8.global-smooth-weight=256.local-smooth-weight=64.converged=0.0001");
00339   cmd1->addArg("--wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method", "wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method.bandwidth=101.bin-count=25.wave-count=3");
00340   cmd1->addArg("--reference-chromosome=22");
00341 
00342   std::vector<std::string> gen;
00343   gen.push_back("${out_batch}/Cytogenetics_Array.10_cels.snpref.a5");
00344   gen.push_back("${out_batch}/Cytogenetics_Array.10_cels.snpref.a5");
00345   gen.push_back("${out_batch}/Cytogenetics_Array.10_cels.snpref.a5");
00346   gen.push_back("${out_batch}/Cytogenetics_Array.10_cels.REF_MODEL");
00347   gen.push_back("${out_batch}/Cytogenetics_Array.10_cels.REF_MODEL");
